mapper.insert: insert into contest ( contest_no, contest_name, contest_projectname, contest_grantingdepartment, contest_level, contest_ranking, contest_date, contest_teachername, contest_teacherdept, contest_stuname, contest_stuno, contest_issubmitcertificate, contest_year, contest_supporting_materials, contest_status )values ( #{contest_no}, #{contest_name}, #{contest_projectname}, #{contest_grantingdepartment}, #{contest_level}, #{contest_ranking}, #{contest_date}, #{contest_teachername}, #{contest_teacherdept}, #{contest_stuname}, #{contest_stuno}, #{contest_issubmitcertificate}, #{contest_year}, #{contest_supporting_materials}, #{contest_status} )
